lead_paragraph: The 52-year-old corrections officer, whose name was not released, suffered serious burns to his hands and arms in the blast in Floyd, N.Y., the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Package Explodes at Mailbox of Prison Guard, Burning Him
headline.main: New York Prison Guard Is Burned When Package Explodes at His Home

snippet: The 52-year-old corrections officer, whose name was not released, suffered serious burns to his hands and arms in the blast in Floyd, N.Y., the authorities said.
abstract: New York State corrections officer is injured when package explodes outside his home in Floyd, NY; it is not known whether he was targeted because of his work.
